## ConditionalArrayItem type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type ConditionalArrayItem<T, K extends keyof T = never> = (IsNever<K> extends true ? T : Merge<T, {
    [k in K]: Array<ConditionalArrayItem<T, K>>;
}>) | false;
```
